price: (Saa nkorͻfoͻ no) nni (nsεm a wͻka no) ho nimdeε; wͻn agya nom nso (a wͻresuasua wͻn no nso) saa ara. Asεm kεseε paa na epue firi wͻn ano no. Nkontomposεm ne deԑ wᴐkeka no.
arabic: مَّا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا لِأٓبَآئِهِمۡۚ كَبُرَتۡ كَلِمَةٗ تَخۡرُجُ مِنۡ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡۚ إِن يَقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā lahum bihi min ʿil'min walā liābāihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwāhihim in yaqūlūna illā kadhiban
